questions.question: Which of the following best differentiates classical from operant conditioning?
options: Classical links stimulus-stimulus; operant links behavior-consequence
Classical requires reinforcement; operant does not
Operant relies on instinct; classical does not
Classical learning is permanent; operant is temporary

questions.question: Pavlov’s finding that dogs salivated at footsteps before food demonstrates:
Extinction in classical conditioning occurs when:
options: UCS is withdrawn completely from learning history
CS is paired too frequently with UCS
